segments.text: Excuse me , how many sightseeing spots are there in the park ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are about 20 main spots and some other small spots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to buy extra ticket if I want to visit the main spots ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , some of the spots charges separately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , do you have through tickets ?
segments.speaker: S1
